newsText: Join us for a relaxing evening with good food, music, and the best company
slogan:
“Let's celebrate together and enjoy
summer in our garden in Kreuzlingen”
eventDetails:
The party starts on Saturday, July 12 at 5 PM in our garden in Kreuzlingen.
Snacks, salads, baguette, sauces, gluten-free bread and drinks will be provided.
Feel free to bring your own BBQ items.
drinksDesc:
Cool drinks and cocktails, freshly mixed for the perfect summer refreshment.
Ideal for quenching your thirst on warm days
grillDesc:
Hearty skewers, crunchy sausages, and fresh vegetables from the grill.
Perfect for a cozy summer evening
gamesDesc:
Fun and entertainment with drinking games like beer pong or flunkyball.
Laughter and good vibes guaranteed
rsvpText:
We're happy if you can join.
Please fill out the form so we can plan.

hannahDesc: Hannah has lived the longest at Remisbergstrasse on the ground floor. She loves to travel, take part in the Social Run Club or do CrossFit, and never says no to a round of Rage Cage.
svenpauliDesc: Sven and Pauli are the newest in the house and live on the 1st floor. They love being active – whether it's bouldering, hiking or cycling – and have redesigned the garden since moving in.
chinisimoneDesc: Chin-I and Simone live on the 2nd floor. While Simone gives it her all in CrossFit, Chin-I prefers basketball. Both love to cook and are always up for a game of beer pong.
welcome:
We're looking forward to
having a great time with you!
